tweets.html:
I'm one beer away from looking up sexy X Files fan fiction. So far, I've had zero beers.

How amazing. The audience at the #enlisted panel did a group hand head. @ATXFestival forever pic.twitter.com/JC8eDa1zu2

— kevinbiegel (@kbiegel) June 7, 2014

I keep getting the urge to put a hand on the head of people toward whom I'm feeling fond. Even strangers. #enlisted @ATXFestival

— Notorious RBF (@stringertheory) June 7, 2014

SVU with subtitles is my favourite SVU. pic.twitter.com/Eyw76aea5K

— Richie (@RichieOnTV) June 7, 2014

Y'all know that when teen wolf grows up he is just gonna be a regular asshole wolf right??

— James Deen (@JamesDeen) June 8, 2014

Glad DirecTV decided to expand their hellishly awful roster of creepy fuck-marionette commercials. (Now w/ intergenerational domestic abuse)

— Anthony Crupi (@crupicrupicrupi) June 8, 2014

"Oh yes I absolutely am switching to Sprint after seeing this ad with a hoarse hamster that fathered humans." -Literally no person ever

— Oriana Schwindt (@Schwindter) June 8, 2014

tweets.author_name: will "@Jack from TWlTTER loves Nazis" weldon
tweets.html:
I'm starting to question Hannibal Lecter's motivation

— will "@Jack from TWlTTER loves Nazis" weldon (@oldmanweldon) June 8, 2014

I like Game Of Thrones but there's so many characters to keep up with. They should all hang out at Central Perk a couple times each episode.

— Gavin Speiller (@gavinspeiller) June 8, 2014

Now the Texas GOP party platform supports using Conversion Therapy to turn the Tony Awards into the CMT Music Awards

— Frank Conniff (@FrankConniff) June 8, 2014

If I was Congress, I'd make a law that said if you win the Triple Crown, you can get set free. #BelmontStakes

— tony pierce (@busblog) June 7, 2014

There should be a ceremonial first pitch of horse racing where a white guy puts on a hat and sets a bunch of money on fire.

— Alison Forns (@alisonforns) June 7, 2014

None of these stupid horses has ever watched True Detective.

— Anthony Crupi (@crupicrupicrupi) June 7, 2014

Think Costas just pulled out a "not!" joke. We're all triple crown winners.

— Michael O'Connell (@mikeylikestv) June 7, 2014

George R.R. Martin's Belmont Stakes

— Dan Hopper (@DanHopp) June 7, 2014

California Chrome ran more like California Internet Explorer

— Faux John Madden (@FauxJohnMadden) June 7, 2014

BREAKING: Horses Had No Fucking Clue What All That Was Just Now

— Chase Mitchell (@ChaseMit) June 7, 2014

Ugh, that's so disappointing. (That horse racing still exists.)

— Ken Tremendous (@KenTremendous) June 7, 2014

I'm sending California Chrome a copy of LUCK s1 on DVD to watch on his well-earned vacation.

— Harry Shuldman (@HarryShuldman) June 7, 2014

not all horses

— Amanda Lucci (@alucci) June 7, 2014

This white guy is mad about the horses #BelmontStakes pic.twitter.com/cDoeGC8Fvk

— nuke kekistan (@beef_target) June 7, 2014

I don't know if this is California Chrome's owner or Yosemite Sam, but he is losing his shit on live TV.

— Michael O'Connell (@mikeylikestv) June 7, 2014

Wow we're getting schooled in sore losing.

— Masked Scheduler (@maskedscheduler) June 7, 2014

Diabeetus is a sore loser—although he's got a point. (Plus, that was the most authentic "post-game" interview ever.)

— Anthony Crupi (@crupicrupicrupi) June 7, 2014

THIS IS WHY WE NEED A FOUR HORSE PLAYOFF

— Ryan Nanni (@celebrityhottub) June 7, 2014

After watching Steve Coburn's red-faced rant in losing and his treatment of his wife, I hope California Chrome is impotent. #BelmontStakes

— Crutnacker (@Crutnacker) June 7, 2014

Best part of Steve Coburn's rant was when his hat rose off his head and steam came out of his ears and he fired his pistols at the ground.

— Crutnacker (@Crutnacker) June 7, 2014

California Chrome owner is bitter and says "It's not fair to these horses." The horses say "This is the least of our problems"

— Albert Brooks (@AlbertBrooks) June 7, 2014

This endless hockey game is sure to be bad news for ABC’s “Bet on Your Baby” and “Sing Your Face Off” ratings. Heh. That was a funny joke.

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) June 8, 2014

Waiting for the stream of #OrphanBlack tweets.... #ATXFestival #Season3

— Mike McComb (@Rube_Goldberg) June 8, 2014

Next: @tatianamaslany as a half-robot/half-unicorn clone! #OrphanBlack

— Dennis Perkins (@DennisPerkins5) June 8, 2014

#OrphanBlack HOLY TILDA SWINTON

— Sybil (@SybilD) June 8, 2014

Cosima playing Dungeons & Dragons is the sexiest shit I have ever seen on this show. Seriously. I fucking love that woman. #OrphanBlack

— MarcW (@Marcohtx) June 8, 2014

Oh Cosima... My heart cannot take you becoming even more nerdy... I love you too much already #OrphanBlack #obspoilers #SaveCosima

— Commander Alex The Helicopter Emoji💐🍩🛋❤️📘✈️ (@anexz6) June 8, 2014

Tony and Felix? This fandom is weird. #OrphanBlack

— ✨ (@xLosingFaith) June 8, 2014

Reading all that "Cosima gets Delphine baked" fic has prepared my for this moment. I'm ready. #OrphanBlack

— 🏳️‍🌈 Crystal 🦄 (@fairytalefrhire) June 8, 2014

Commercial breaks during #OrphanBlack are engineered so you can catch your breath from a combo of laughing/hyperventilating. Damn.

— Ceil (@ceilanese) June 8, 2014

How do I get my own Fee. I adore him. #OrphanBlack

— MegMeg (@Redsoul267) June 8, 2014

No, no, no, no, nooo, nope, nooo. Fuck, no, please, nope. #OrphanBlack #cloneclub

— Elysia (@yellowcape) June 8, 2014

I AM NOT OK !!!! I NEED TO CALL SOMEONE !!! PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME !!!!!!!! #OrphanBlack #clonesbians #CloneClub #SaveCosima #SaveCosima

— Audrey🇫🇷🏳️‍🌈🇺🇸 (@pamplemoussee76) June 8, 2014

Want #CloneClub road trip movie: "Sestra Act." New one drives, Helena picks music, Alison brings snacks, Cosima packs herb. Sarah glowers.

— Mo Ryan (@moryan) June 8, 2014

Catching up on Veep and Orange Is the New Black, and wondering why they even bother making shows where the leads aren't complicated women.

— Louis Peitzman (@LouisPeitzman) June 8, 2014

It's an honor just to be included in so many Netflix statistics.

— Alexa Planje (@HerQueue) June 8, 2014

it’s so nice out but the sun is wasting its time on a day when everyone is staying inside marathoning Orange Is The New Black on Netflix

Okay, time to see if orange is still the new black in episode 4.

— Grace (@GemOfAmara) June 8, 2014

The world is now divided into people who watch the #OITNB credits and those who do not. The latter are WRONG.

It's easy to tell who does and who doesn't have a job by how quickly they've watched #OITNB. I'm on episode 2. https://t.co/9qXV13enP7

— Richie (@RichieOnTV) June 8, 2014

When I get on Tumblr on Monday I better see gifs of @Lavernecox saying "Fierce? Or FIERCE." #OitNB

I thought I was becoming a more productive person. False alarm! I can still shotgun a season of OITNB in 2 days. What a relief.

— Alexa Planje (@HerQueue) June 8, 2014

Just watched 7 episodes of #OITNB in a row....which is definitely too many for one sitting #feelings #toomanyfeelings

— Jillian Ellis (@jillian_ellis) June 8, 2014

I enjoy watching Orange Is the New Black because it lets me imagine a world where Juilliard grads are rounded up and sent to prison.

UUUUUUUUGGGHHHH LARRY. #OITNB
